TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Vector4 extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype Urho.Vector4>

Docs.summary: Represents a 4D vector using four single-precision floating-point numbers.
Docs.remarks: The Vector4 structure is suitable for interoperation with unmanaged code requiring four consecutive floats.

Docs.summary: Gets the length (magnitude) of the vector.

MemberSignature.Value: public float LengthFast { get; }
.property instance float32 LengthFast

Docs.summary: Gets an approximation of the vector length (magnitude).
Docs.remarks: This property uses an approximation of the square root function to calculate vector magnitude, with an upper error bound of 0.001.

MemberSignature.Value: public float LengthSquared { get; }
.property instance float32 LengthSquared

Docs.summary: Gets the square of the vector length (magnitude).
Docs.remarks: This property avoids the costly square root operation required by the Length property. This makes it more suitable for comparisons.
